div1.p: Moses Austin to Elias Austin Elliott.

Sixty Days after sight of this my first of Exchange Second of the same Tener unpaid paid I pay to Mr Horice Austin Middletown. or Order fifteen Hundred Dollars agreeable to Orders receiv'd, further advice unnecessary—
Accepted on condition the Cargo Arrives safe in New York.—
[Endorsements:] Pay Henry Austin or order Value received
Receivd Moses Austin Note of Hand for Seventeen Hundred and Eighty two Dollars, twenty Nine Cents—
